title: Versatile and portable DSP platform for
filename: Versatile and portable DSP platform for learning embedded signal processing.mmd
excerpt:
# Versatile and portable DSP platform for

learning embedded signal processing

###### Abstract

This paper presents a versatile and portable digital signal processing (DSP) platform that is highly suitable for learning embedded signal processing anywhere and anytime. This DSP platform is based on the Texas Instruments VC5505 e2DSP USB Stick. We outline some of the important features in this development tool, such as the internal fast Fourier transform (FFT) hardware accelerator and the programm

using Discrete Cosine Transform

Chia-Jeng Tseng and Maurice F. Aburdene
